result.eng: I haven't paid road tax on that old car.
result.ga: Níor íoc mé cáin bhóthair ar an seancharr sin
result.orig: Níor íoc mé cáin bhóthair ar an seancharr sin
result.html: Níor íoc mé cáin bhóthair ar an seancharr sinI haven't paid road tax on that old car.
result.ponchtml: Níor íoc mé cáin ḃóṫair ar an seanċarr sinI haven't paid road tax on that old car.

result.html: Shiúil sí trasna an bhóthairShe walked across the road.
result.ponchtml: Ṡiúil sí trasna an ḃóṫairShe walked across the road.

result.eng: I will meet you on the street corner.
result.ga: Casfaidh mé leat ag cúinne an bhóthair
result.orig: Casfaidh mé leat ag cúinne an bhóthair
result.html: Casfaidh mé leat ag cúinne an bhóthairI will meet you on the street corner.
result.ponchtml: Casfaiḋ mé leat ag cúinne an ḃóṫairI will meet you on the street corner.
